page.title: 06Surveys of 52 School Pupils
page.content: {Q. How many children in your family? {A.}7 families had one child. 25 families had two children. 5 families had three children. 1 family had five children. 1 family had six children. {There is an average of 2.2 children { in each family. { {Q. How many Television sets are in {your house? {A.}No family is without a television set. 13 families have one television set. 13 families have two television sets. 12 families have three television sets. 1 family has four television sets. {There is an average of two {television sets for each family.
